titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow vendor refunds of Federal excise taxes on kerosene used in unvented heaters for home heating purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/2/1998--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow, when certain conditions are met, vendor refunds of Federal excise taxes on kerosene used in unvented heaters for home heating purposes.
